name: Legendary Slide 2 - Platinum Edition
description:
Play Legendary Slide II in the Platinum Edition! Remove all mahjong tiles from the board, solve over 80 unique mahjong puzzles, and collect gems to restore the ancient Temple of the Air Gods and continue your journey through the legendary world of Legendary Slide II.

* Platinum Edition with additional content and walkthrough videos.
* Over 80 puzzle levels!
* Customize your backgrounds and stone layouts.
* Play Legendary Slide and Legendary Mahjong.
* New bonus tiles!
* Pleasant, relaxing music.
